thread.title: Millenium Hilton
thread.title_full: Millenium Hilton - Review of Millenium Hilton, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Marissa C
title: Millenium Hilton
text: I loved the view, the room was really clean and the location is great! Paid $52 on breakfast for two, that you would get complimentary at some hotels. The bellman and the hotel staff were great. We could see the World Trade Center right out our window. There is a mini bar and refreshment drawer for convenience, just don't remove anything longer then 5 mins or you will be automatically charged.
